Posted By: achilleselbow (4/23/2010 11:26:23 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content: In limited, he's one of the few cards that can side deck in against a beast deck and end the game. Suddenly your opponent has no blockers turn 6-8, and you're playing red so you should have enough to do that last 10 damage to win on the board. Forget that he himself is a beast, it's a fantastic side deck for limited. Just because it's not a [Jace, the Mind Sculptor](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Jace, the Mind Sculptor) doesn't mean it's a terrible card.

Posted By: aa124 (4/27/2011 6:24:24 AM)

posts.post_content:
Zuty's Random Card of the Day #2:  
  
6 for a 6/6 isn't that bad; of course there are better options, some of which are cheaper in cost, but 5C for a 6/6 is rather easy to deal with.  
  
I have fond memories of this card just because of the art and flavor text. I don't think I ever played with this card or made a deck that contained it. I'm sure I could put this to good use in Poor Man's (5 uncommon, 55 commons), but there are some other uses I see for this. It stops **ALL** Beasts from blocking. So you can stop Beasts your opponent is using from blocking, but how often is that? Well, with cards like [Amoeboid Changeling](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Amoeboid Changeling), [Conspiracy](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Conspiracy), [Imagecrafter](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Imagecrafter), and [Unnatural Selection](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Unnatural Selection) that can all be changed. You can also use [Artificial Evolution](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Artificial Evolution) (put it on [Isochron Scepter](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Isochron Scepter) if you want) to change 'Beast' to whatever else you want.  
  
Even with this small amount of good that can be ... [(see all)](javascript:void(0);)
